title: Winter Warmth Drive - Dhaka
description: Join us to distribute winter clothes and blankets to the underprivileged in Dhaka.

title: Chattogram Blanket Campaign
description: Providing blankets to families in rural areas of Chattogram to combat the winter chill.

title: Rajshahi Winter Relief
description: Distributing winter clothes and hot meals to those in need in Rajshahi.

title: Sylhet Warmth Campaign
description: Providing warmth and comfort through donations to communities in Sylhet.

title: Barisal Community Drive
description: Helping vulnerable families in Barisal stay warm this winter through donations.

title: Khulna Kindness Initiative
description: Spreading warmth and hope by delivering winter essentials in Khulna.
